mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, categrpno, memberno, title, content, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, cnt, replycnt, rdate) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{categrpno}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, #{cnt}, #{replycnt}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, categrpno, memberno, title, content, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, cnt, replycnt, rdate FROM notice WHERE categrpno=#{categrpno} ORDER BY noticeno DESC
